scripts.doc:production: typedoc --plugin typedoc-plugin-markdown --theme markdown --out doc --exclude "**/git-api/*.ts" --gitRevision main index.ts
scripts.doc: npm run doc:git-api; npm run doc:production
scripts.generate:production: OUTPUT=. SPEC=$(node preProcess.js 'https://console.redhat.com/api/vulnerability/v1/openapi.json') npm run generate
scripts.generate:git-api: OUTPUT=git-api SPEC=$(node preProcess.js 'https://console.redhat.com/api/vulnerability/v1/openapi.json') npm run generate
scripts.generate:prod: npm run generate:git-api && npm run generate:production && ./postProcess.sh
scripts.generate:single: npm run generate:prod && npm run doc
